name: Watering Feelings
description:
A calm game-like experience that won't take you very long to play, but that if you surrender to, will redefine your idea of what it means to water plants.

Through hours and hours of labor, prominent philosopher-waterers have determined the three cornerstones of mindful plant watering:

1. Befriend the plant

2. Allow the watering can to guide your every motion

3. Have patience
